title: Input schema for Instagram scraper
description:
This scraper takes the provided Instagram URLs or search results and attempts to scrape Instagram posts, comments or detailed information from each of URL. It's able to scrape posts from user profiles, hashtags and places. Comments from posts and detailed information about all of these.
Important: Proxy is required to use this solution

apiUrlProvider.title: API Url Provider
apiUrlProvider.description: API to retrieve list of urls

search.title: Search
search.description: What to query to search Instagram for

searchType.title: Search type
searchType.description: What to type of items to search (you can search hashtags, profiles and places)

searchLimit.title: Search results limit
searchLimit.description: How many search results (eq. pages) should be processed

directUrls.title: Instagram URLs
directUrls.description: From which pages should posts/comments/details be loaded. Provide complete url to the profile, hashtag, place or post.

resultsType.title: Which data to scrape
resultsType.description: What to scrape from each Instagram URL or search result

resultsLimit.title: Max items
resultsLimit.description: How many posts or comments to scrape from each Instagram URL or found page, ignored when "Details" type is specified

proxy.title: Proxy configuration
proxy.description: Proxy is required to run this actor! Either use Apify proxy, or provide your own proxy servers.
